description: Increased evaporation, soil water depletion and irrigation challenges
Not able to plant at all, less food security
Wetlands and riverine systems converted to other ecosystems
More cooling, more electricity, more fossil fuels, more power outages
More favorable conditions for  pests and diseases, higher insecticide use
More crimes because people sleep outside room
Threat for the health of community, including farmers
Heat-related mortality (especially those with reduced immune system)
Human stress, less social, psychological and less conjugal activities
Unpredictable weather patterns make it difficult to plan
